name: Circle Garden
description:
A simple virtual pet terrarium made for the #dogpitjam IN THE ZONE Virtual Pet Jam. Both critters and fruit bushes are created from genes that their offspring inherit. The populations will evolve over time, and you can always add new critters and bushes - and even control the mutation rate!

Controls:

Left Mouse Button: Select critters, terrarium controls

Right Mouse Button: Unselect critter

WASD/Arrow Keys: Pan camera
